comments:
I got this seemingly because there are queries in my task list that do not show up.

-- Error Log --
Date: Thu Sep 07 12:41:00 PDT 2006
Message: Login error occurred while querying Bugzilla Server https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs.Ensure proper configuration in Task Repositories View.
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.mylar.bugzilla.ui
Stack Trace:
javax.security.auth.login.LoginException: Invalid Username or Password
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.BugzillaServerFacade.parseHtmlError(BugzillaServerFacade.java:191)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.AbstractReportFactory.collectResults(AbstractReportFactory.java:139)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.core.RepositoryQueryResultsFactory.performQuery(RepositoryQueryResultsFactory.java:42)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.search.BugzillaSearchEngine.search(BugzillaSearchEngine.java:138)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.tasklist.BugzillaCategorySearchOperation.search(BugzillaCategorySearchOperation.java:111)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.tasklist.BugzillaCategorySearchOperation.execute(BugzillaCategorySearchOperation.java:85)
at org.eclipse.mylar.internal.bugzilla.ui.tasklist.BugzillaRepositoryConnector.performQuery(BugzillaRepositoryConnector.java:199)
at org.eclipse.mylar.tasks.ui.SynchronizeQueryJob.run(SynchronizeQueryJob.java:103)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
I'll investigate this since it is happening in my task list.
So this turns out to be user error on my part.  I had a query that was filtered away because it only had completed tasks.  Once the FAQ has stabilized I'll update it with this info.
